Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield City Council. Support service for those with a visual impairment. The team employs qualified Rehabilitation Officers and social workers who can offer advice and information about any aspect of visual impairment: getting around more safely; reading and writing skills; safer kitchen skills; specialist equipment (including computer software); local, regional and national organisations; basic benefits and social/support groups. Holds the register of sight impaired people within the city. Specialist service for people with dual-sensory loss. Self or any referral.
